title: Inside Sotheby’s $500 Million Bet on its Disgraced Ex-Chairman
text:
Inside Sotheby’s $500 Million Bet on its Disgraced Ex-Chairman 
Published By: NYTimes - Today 
A. Alfred Taubman dragged Sotheby’s into a price-fixing scandal. Now, after his death, the auction house is trumpeting the sale of his tre...
